en:
You have multiple tickets associated with your information, such as your name and email address. If you are lending a ticket to someone else, please reassign the ticket so that their details are printed on badges, and they'll be able to access their account on the event website and app.

Would you like to reassign any tickets?

To reassign later, click Continue now and access this option later by clicking Your Tickets in the top-right menu.

If you are lending a ticket to someone else, please reassign the ticket so that their details are printed on badges, and they'll be able to access their account on the event website and app.
